page.title: 02POPULATION
page.content: There are 603 people on the Register of Electors,and the total population of the village is more than 800. Of these 32% have lived in the village for less than 5 years, and another 20% have been here less than 10 years.Only 15% 0f the population were born in the village. Few people now earn their living from farming- 12% as compared with 29% being engaged in the professions and 16% in industry.There are a large number of people unemployed; 20% of employable people being out of work though only a quarter of these are seeking work. A number of people retire to the village and 23% over 16 are retired;of these 5% came to the village on retirement.
